name: Night Of The Pumpkins
description:
You're stuck in a spooky arena with only vengeful pumpkins and skulls for friends. And they're not friendly!

This is a first person shooter we developed as part of 1GAM Galway Game Jam, October 21-22, 2017. A collaboration between DoomCube and Psychic Software.

Move - WASD
Look - mouse
Shoot - left mouse
Pull towards teleport node - right mouse
Deploy shield - middle mouse
